SELECT jteq.empId,jteq.empName from jxlt_formal_emp_queue jteq left join jxlt_emp_dutyrule jed on jteq.empId=jed.empId where dutyTypeId = #{dutyTypeId} GROUP BY jteq.empId ORDER BY jteq.rowId
mapper.insert: -- insert into jxlt_formal_emp_queue(rowId,empId,empName) select rowId,empId,empName from jxlt_temp_emp_queue insert into jxlt_formal_emp_queue(empId,empName) select empId,empName from jxlt_temp_emp_queue
mapper.select: select aa.empId,aa.empName from(select jfeq.empId,jfeq.empName,jfdr.dutyDate,jfdr.dutyTypeId from jxlt_formal_emp_queue jfeq left join jxlt_formal_duty_result jfdr on jfeq.empId=jfdr.empId) aa left join jxlt_holidays jh on aa.dutyDate=jh.holidayDate where date_format(aa.dutyDate, '%Y') >='2020' and jh.HolidayType=1;

SELECT*FROM jxlt_formal_duty_result WHERE date_format(dutyDate, '%Y %m') = date_format(DATE_SUB(#{dutyDate}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y %m') and dutyTypeId in (4,6,7) and empName in (select name from jxlt_employee)
